name: Easy Mediterranean Orzo Salad
author: thedailygourmet
summary: This salad is an incorporation of a variety of Mediterranean ingredients with a light lemon sauce to bind it all together. Feel free to substitute ingredients for a more customized salad. Due to many ingredients I've listed having a naturally salty flavor, I've refrained from the addition of salt.
ingredients: ¼ cup marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
¼ cup roasted red peppers, drained and chopped
2 tablespoons ricotta salata cheese, crumbled or shaved
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook orzo in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes
Toss orzo with lemon-infused olive oil
Add olives, artichoke hearts, chickpeas, roasted red peppers, pine nuts, and ricotta salata
Refrigerate to chill and allow flavors to build
